INSTRUCTIONS

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 433, 292, 449]]<|/det|>
- Answer all questions.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 449, 761, 465]]<|/det|>
- Use a black or dark blue pen. You may use an HB pencil for any diagrams or graphs.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 466, 808, 481]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 482, 565, 497]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 497, 482, 511]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 513, 363, 527]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 529, 482, 544]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 546, 335, 559]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 562, 466, 576]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 577, 666, 608]]<|/det|>
